products.title: 3M KN95 Particulate Respirator Mask
products.description: Maintain a healthy respiratory system with this KN95 respirator, reducing exposure to bacteria, viruses and potentially harmful airborne biological contaminants.

products.title: Dettol Instant Hand Sanitiser
products.description: The Dettol Instant Hand Sanitiser kills 99.9% of germs instantly, without water anytime, anywhere. Use while in car, office, handbag, picnics, nappy change, travel, sports, etc.

products.title: Disposable Vinyl Powder Free Gloves
products.description: The Ultra Fresh Disposable Vinyl Powder Free Gloves can withstand punctures, stretches and tears at a decent rate. Perfect for health care situations to maintain hygiene.

products.title: Sorbent Clean & Fresh Silky Wipes
products.description: Lightly moistened. Kind to sensitive skin. Safe to flush (Based on independent laboratory testing, this product passes the INDA/EDANA Guidelines for Flushability).
